title: Want loyalty? Investing in hard-to-reach audiences will be the key
description: For more than a decade, the news industry has chased scale: bigger audiences, more pageviews, broader appeal. We’ve often heard: focus on the journalism first, and the audience will follow. I’ve never believed that, and in 2026, I think the industry will finally be forced to reckon with how wrong that assumption is. The future...
